text: `dynamic_page_hubdb_row.course` would be an array if it's multiselect, so you need to access it by index (`dynamic_page_hubdb_row.course[0].name`) or by looping through it (`{% for course in dynamic_page_hubdb_row.course %}{{ course.name }}{% endfor %}`)
Hello, I am a newbie. I am trying to write a form based on the deals table. I believe I need the table id for the query. How can I obtain the table id for the deals table?

Hi all, i have alot of dynamic pages and i want to integrate a module like `featured products` , where the client can add image, text field and link to the featured product in the template editor. is there a way that the featured product will be different on every dynamic page? like when you go to cars/toyota, you will have featured product `toyota` , when you go to cars/mercedes you get featured product `mercedes` .
Is this possible?
Dynamic page content comes from HubDB. So I order to add that content you must crest the columns in the HubDB table and then add the references into the template.
If you need assistance my team can help.
